item.title: Report E-2025020416
item.description:
Report E-2025020416

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-04T15:15:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-28
  • City: LAS CRUCES
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: J. B. HUNT TRANSPORT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 8500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: D&H Petroleum & Environmental Services was dispatched to the site. Upon the contractorâ€™s arrival, personnel observed that the released material impacted the asphalt parking lot and estimated that three (3) gallons of material was released due to a improper securement for shipment that resulted in three (3) 5-gallon plastic buckets to fall during offloading. D&H Petroleum & Environnmental Services personnel deployed granular absorbents to impacted area. The spent absorbents were recovered and containerized into one (1) 55-gallon metal drum. The generated waste was transported offsite for disposal.
